extendedInfo.description: A free Bible App from The Bible Society of Haiti. Now you can read, listen, and share God's Word. Carry the Bible App from the Haitian Bible Society wherever you go.App: Â© 2011 Subsplash, Content: Â© 2011 Bible Society of Haiti. All rights reserved.Keywords: Bible, Bible.is, Faith Comes By Hearing, Society, Haiti, Subsplash, Haitian Creole, Kreyol Ayisyen, God

reviews.title: Works as designed
reviews.comment: tried installing twice. Only the English Standard version is installed. The app will not change the version to either KIJ or the 2 1999 Kreyole versions in the list  Google Nexus 7 android app  Edited - on my Nexus I have to tap to the far left of the translation name. Issue resolved by user correction! :)  Not sure why there are 2 1999 Editions listed under Kreyole? Tapping either one check-marks both entries
reviews.author: Ray Aten

reviews.title: Update
reviews.comment: Does anyone know a way for the Creole version to play more than Matthew? Can all the books play audio fir the Creole version?
reviews.author: Marykay Myway

reviews.title: Thanks!
reviews.comment: The kreyol is found under the different versions available at the top.  When it first opens, click the word \"Matthew 1\" at the top and select Haitian.  :-)  Enjoy!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: It works!!
reviews.comment: Mezan li bon wi! Jusk peze kote ki make Matthew a, epi lap montre kote pou-w chwazi: \"Books\" oubyen \"Translation\". Chwazi \"Translation\" Krey\303\262l 1999, epi sa va chanje son an krey\303\262l av\303\250k tradiktyon an tou. You guys did a good job on this app!!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: This is English and Haitian Creole
reviews.comment: Those who have said this is not a Haitian Creole bible are wrong. It has both English and Creole. You juat have to click on Matthew at the top and select Translation.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Bon men ...
reviews.comment: Mwen beni nom Papa Bondye pou gwo travay sa, mwen swete nou fe yon fason pou moun ka retire verse pou nou ka voye bay moun nan sms...
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Perfect
reviews.comment: It couldnt be better than this. I love it
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: The text is English.  The recording is in English. There is no Kreyol in this app.  Uninstalled. I already have YouVersion Bible.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: I though it was a Bible in Haitian Creole, but it is english. :-(
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Good
reviews.comment: Its good but, when you put it in creole it change by itself
reviews.author: A Google User
